casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION as trustee FOR CREDIT SUISSE FIRST BOSTON MORTGAGE SECURITIES CORP., HOME EQUITY ASSET TRUST 2006-4, HOME EQUITY PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2006-4, Appellant,
v.
Linda F. SHARPTON a/k/a Linda Sharpton; Accredited Home Lenders, Inc., Successor by merger to Aames Funding Corporation d/b/a Aames Home Loan; Magnolia Ridge North Homeowners Association, Inc.; Unknown Spouse of Linda F. Sharpton a/k/a Linda Sharpton; Unknown Tenant in Possession of the Subject Property, Appellees. No. 1D17-5288 District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District. August 15, 2018
Rehearing Denied September 24, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

AFFIRMED.
